data.title: Kate (Cole) Porter (1862-1952)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Kate (Cole) Porter born 1862 Brandy City, Sierra, California, United States died 1952 Peru, Miami, Indiana, United States including ancestors + children + 1 photos + DNA connections + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Kate Porter formerly Cole

Born 27 Jan 1862 in Brandy City, Sierra, California, United States

Ancestors

Daughter of James Omar Cole and Rachel (Henton) Cole

Sister of Louis Adkison Cole

Wife of Samuel Fenwick Porter — married 9 Apr 1884 (to 1927) in Peru, Peru Township, Miami, Indiana, United States

Mother of Cole Albert Porter

Died 2 Aug 1952 at age 90 in Peru, Miami, Indiana, United States

Profile last modified 3 Jun 2022 | Created 19 Apr 2012

This page has been accessed 1,647 times.

Biography

Kate was born in 1862. She is the daughter of James Cole. In 1880, Kate lived with her family at 250 Broadway, Peru, Miami, Indiana. The household included her father, J.O. Cole, 52, born in Ohio, a dealer in malt liquors; his wife Rachel, 42, born in Indiana, whose parents were born in Ohio; and their two children, both born in California, and both in school: Kate, 18; and Louis, 15. [1]

Kate married Samuel F. Porter. They are the parents of composer Cole Porter. She passed away in 1952, at the age of 90, in Peru, Indiana. She is buried with several family members in a large family plot in Mount Hope Cemetery, Peru, Indiana. [2]

Sources

↑ "United States Census, 1880," database with images, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:MH9T-FH2 : 14 August 2017), Kate Cole in household of J O Cole, Peru, Miami, Indiana, United States; citing enumeration district ED 119, sheet 512C, NARA microfilm publication T9 (Washington D.C.: National Archives and Records Administration, n.d.), roll 0298; FHL microfilm 1,254,298.

↑ Find A Grave: Kate Cole Porter

(http://wc.rootsweb.ancestry.com/cgi-bin/igm.cgi?op=GET&db=46403&id=I17282)
